summary: I have worked as an iOS mobile developer for about 4 years and am currently working as a freelancer, balancing iOS development and education. Recently, I have been expanding my full-stack development capabilities while exploring ways to quickly implement services using AI technology and efficient learning methods to grow alongside AI. I enjoy actively exploring the latest technologies and tools, applying them to real projects, and sharing my experiences.

experience.companyDescription: Medical device startup developing ring-type blood pressure monitor CART BP
achievements: Migrated consumer app from UIKit, RxSwift to SwiftUI + TCA + Tuist (modularization)

experience.companyDescription: Online bootcamp education institution under ESTsoft
achievements: Responsible for Q&A, mentoring, and project evaluation for ~40 students
Supported SwiftUI, UIKit, and Advanced iOS Programming courses

experience.companyDescription: Online extracurricular program for national university students in Gyeongsang province
achievements: Taught ~80 students in Beginner/Intermediate iOS Development (twice a week, 8 weeks)
Delivered Swift basics, iOS programming fundamentals, and mentored individual projects

achievements: Developed and maintained new features, managed deployment for Parent/Teacher apps

descriptions: Real-time weather information widget app development for Apple Vision Pro

projects.name: Dot Slash Dash App Upload Feature Renewal
projects.techStack: SwiftUI, AVFoundation, MVVM, JavaScript, Rich Editor
descriptions: Complete renewal project for video selection, memo writing, editing, and upload features
Completed and improved features in unfinished project → Enhanced code analysis skills
Improved WebView-based Rich Editor → Increased adaptability to unfamiliar languages and platforms
Introduced and actively participated in code reviews for iOS team → Improved PR-based collaboration

projects.name: Tictoccroc Parent & Teacher iOS Apps
projects.techStack: UIKit, SnapKit, ReactorKit, RxSwift, Fastlane, Clean Architecture
descriptions: Developed and operated Parent app (notice search/application) and Teacher app (education/care management)
Migrated from AutoResize (Storyboard) to AutoLayout (SnapKit) → Resolved view bugs and merge conflicts
Removed global superclass dependencies → Reduced potential for errors
Improved WebView event bridge functions → Enabled rapid response to frontend requests
Refactored inconsistent MVP patterns to ReactorKit → Accelerated bug fixes and feature additions
Built design system and developed custom UI → Improved collaboration efficiency and development speed

projects.name: Tictoccroc Teacher App Flutter Migration
descriptions: Project to rebuild native iOS app using Flutter
Implemented iOS environment setup and onboarding screens
Started project after 2 weeks of Flutter study → Quickly learned and presented prototype, gained C-level trust
Enhanced understanding of declarative UI and state management

sideProjects.name: Sori AI - AI Care Call Service
sideProjects.description:
AI care call service for elderly living alone.
